headline: Cisco Systems (CSCO) Valuation Check After New Wi Fi 7 And AI Infrastructure Partnerships
summary: Cisco Systems (CSCO) just announced two high-profile deals, a campus-wide Wi-Fi 7 buildout at Georgetown University and an AI infrastructure tie up with SharonAI and Digital Alpha in Asia Pacific, drawing fresh attention to the stock. See our latest analysis for Cisco Systems. Despite the fresh Georgetown and SharonAI announcements, Cisco’s share price has eased in the short term, with a 1 month share price return of 6.47% decline and a year to date share price return of 3.54% decline. Longer...

headline: NWN Expands Intelligent Connectivity: A Multi-OEM, AI-Powered Network-as-a-Service Platform for the Modern Enterprise
summary: BOSTON, January 21, 2026--NWN, the leading AI-powered managed services provider, today announced an expanded vision for Intelligent Connectivity, its next-generation Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) offering designed to unify and modernize enterprise networking across multiple strategic OEM ecosystems. headline: Furl Raises $10M Seed Round to Bring Agentic AI to Security Remediation
summary: LOS ANGELES, January 21, 2026--Furl, a security remediation startup, today announced a $10 million Seed round led by Ten Eleven Ventures, with participation from Rapid7 CEO Corey Thomas and Open Opportunity Fund. Founded by veterans of Rapid7, Automox, and Censys, Furl is focused on the part of security workflows most tools stop short of: execution.

headline: Versa Named Global SD-WAN Leader by Frost & Sullivan
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., January 21, 2026--Versa, the global leader in unified security and networking, today announced that Frost & Sullivan, the technology consulting and research firm, has recognized Versa as the global SD-WAN industry leader in its latest annual report analyzing market trends and comparing the top vendors. In the new Frost RadarTM for SD-WAN Infrastructure 2025 report, Versa ranked highest on Frost & Sullivan’s Innovation Index and Growth Index among the nine SD-WAN companies ev

headline: Plume Appoints Rebecca Stone as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: Plume, a leader in cloud-managed Wi-Fi, security, and smart home services for Internet Service Providers (ISPs), today announced the appointment of Rebecca Stone as the company's new Chief Marketing Officer.

headline: Managed Services Market to Grow from $430 Billion in 2026 to $704 Billion by 2031: Strategic Analysis of IBM, Cisco Systems, Fujitsu, AT&T, HPE and Other Key Players
summary: Dublin, Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Managed Services - Market Share Analysis, Industry Trends & Statistics, Growth Forecasts (2026-2031)" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. headline: Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins on building infrastructure for the AI era
summary: Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the shift to AI vendors, building AI infrastructure, future of AI adoption, sentiment amongst business leaders, and more.
